price: 7 En vérité, les impies sont voués à la plus infâme des prisons[1563].
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
